title: Zaza Pachulia NBA Stats & News
snippet: His averages of 5.4 points, 4.7 rebounds and 1.6 assists were all down from a season prior, extending a three-year trend of shrinking production. With the Warriors set to move on from Pachulia, the big man now joins the Pistons on a one-year deal for the veteran's minimum.
